channel.title: HELP ME GUYS! I can't understeand
channel.description: guys i need help whit command in 508 server. It need look like this - [b]it removes whip from invent and gives 5mil for it![/b] it's like sell whip, whit command i dont know how to made it... so someone maybee know? Plz help me i REally need this :S :confused: :confused: :confused: :| :o

item.title: HELP ME GUYS! I can't understeand
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if(cmd[0].equals("sellwhip")) { if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 4151, 1) == true) Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,4151, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 4151), 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 1000000); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You sell your whip for 1 million GP."); } else { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need a whip in order to use this command."); }

Read full topic
item.source: HELP ME GUYS! I can't understeand

item.title: HELP ME GUYS! I can't understeand
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

GUys ty for helping but jc22493 that code is for 317 servers but i need 508!
i figured out when it can look like this

} else if(cmd[0].equals(“sellwhip”)) {
if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 4151, 1) == true)
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,4151, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 4151), 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 1000000);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “U sell ur whip and gain 1mil coins :)”);

its o.k but one proplem it’s gives 1mil coins if u dont hawe whip in ur invent to why ? anyone? can help plz!!
